Title: Prologue to the Beginning and End
Actors: Mamoru Miyano, Asami Imai, Kana Hanazawa, Tomokazu Seki
Plot: In the summer of 2010, self-proclaimed mad scientist, Rintarou Okabe, goes to a seminar on time travel with his friend, Mayuri Shiina. While there, he meets a girl named Kurisu Makise who ...
